pages.text: $(li)Foxes are passive animals that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/taiga)Taiga$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_taiga)Snowy Taiga$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/taiga_mountains)Taiga Mounstains$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/giant_taiga)Giant Taiga$(/l), or in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/red_spotted_taiga)Red Spotted Taiga$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They will jump to their prey, $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/chicken)Chickens$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/rabbit)Rabbits$(/l), Cod, Salmon, Tropical Fishes and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/turtle)Baby Turtles$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be bred giving two Foxes $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/sweet_berries)Sweet Berries$(/l).
